question: Which of the following project is the interstate project for electricity sharing between Madhya Pradesh government and Uttar Pradesh government?
explanation: Rajghat dam constructed on Betwa River is an Inter-state Dam project of the Government of Madhya Pradesh and Uttar Pradesh, located about 14 km from Historical place Chanderi in Madhya Pradesh and 22 km from Lalitpur in Uttar Pradesh.At present Project generates 45MW electricity equally shared by two governments of MP and UP.
